parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

datasetStructure: One record per event per device

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Expected rather than required because events may happen to or with a device that do not involved subjects, and may even be before the device was in contact with a subject.  In these cases there may not be a value for USUBJID.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, or combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESEQ

datasetVariables.description: May be any valid number.  It should be unique within every subject/device combination.  If there is no USUBJID associated with the event, DESEQ should be unique within each SPDEVID.
datasetVariables.label: Device Events Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DESEQ

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESPID

datasetVariables.description: Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database.  Note that it does not have to be numeric.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DESPID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DETERM

datasetVariables.description: Examples: Screw Breakage, Fissure Formation, Battery Issue
datasetVariables.label: Reported Term for Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DETERM

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEMODIFY

datasetVariables.description: If DETERM is modified, then the modified text is placed here.
datasetVariables.label: Modified Device Event Name
datasetVariables.name: DEMODIFY

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEDECOD

datasetVariables.description: Dictionary-derived text description of DETERM or DEMODIFY. 'The name and version of the dictionary used to map terms must be provided in a Define.XML ExternalCodeList element.
datasetVariables.label: Device Events Dictionary-Derived Term
datasetVariables.name: DEDECOD

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DECAT

datasetVariables.description: For example, MALFUNCTION vs. CALIBRATION
datasetVariables.label: Category of Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DECAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESCAT

datasetVariables.description: For example, EXTERNAL vs. INTERNAL
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory of  Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DESCAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEPRESP

datasetVariables.description: For example, DETERM could contain a list of malfunctions that are being specifically evaluated.  DEPRESP would identify those (Y), while any spontaneous events would have DEPREST = null.
datasetVariables.label: Pre-Specified Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DEPRESP

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEOCCUR

datasetVariables.description: Values are null for events not specifically solicited.
datasetVariables.label: Device Event Occurrence
datasetVariables.name: DEOCCUR

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESTAT

datasetVariables.description: For example, if equipment operation requires checking, such as checking an event log to detect events. Capturing that the checks were not completed may be relevant to interpreting the study data.
datasetVariables.label: Device Event Collection Status
datasetVariables.name: DESTAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEREASND

datasetVariables.description: This variable should only be used if there are prespecified events.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Device Event Not Collected
datasetVariables.name: DEREASND

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESEV

datasetVariables.description: Terms Describing Severity of Event (e.g., the severity of a Malfunction)
datasetVariables.label: Device Event Severity
datasetVariables.name: DESEV

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEACNDEV

datasetVariables.description: Action Taken may include removal, calibration, reprogramming, etc.  Action is usually in response to some event, for example, a subject's adverse event
datasetVariables.label: Action Taken with Device
datasetVariables.name: DEACNDEV

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: This value is usually derived.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Visit
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEDTC

self.title: Date of Device Event Data Collection

datasetVariables.description: This may be reported if the event (e.g., malfunction) is discovered on a different date from the event
datasetVariables.label: Date of Device Event Data Collection
datasetVariables.name: DEDTC

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESTDTC

datasetVariables.description: If the event happened at a single point in time, DESTDTC is used.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DESTDTC

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEENDTC

datasetVariables.description: If an event lasted over a period of time, DEENDTC can be used to capture the end date/time.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Device Event
datasetVariables.name: DEENDTC

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEDY

self.title: Study Day of Device Event Data Collection

datasetVariables.description: Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Device Event Data Collection
datasetVariables.name: DEDY

modelClassVariable.title: Study Day of Start of Observation

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DESTDY

self.title: Study Day of Device Event Start Date/Time

datasetVariables.description: Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Device Event Start Date/Time
datasetVariables.name: DESTDY

modelClassVariable.title: Study Day of End of Observation

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DE.DEENDY

self.title: Study Day of Device Event End Date/Time

datasetVariables.description: Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFENDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Device Event End Date/Time
datasetVariables.name: DEENDY

description: An events domain that contains data for device-related events. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102616, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Events
name: DE
